comments.body:
Does 
```
RNTuple ntuple = reader.GetNTuple("MyNTuple");
```
If it does, isn't it 'better' than using the Get()?

In this case it doesn't work because we can't coerce `RResult<RNTuple>` back to `RNTuple`. 
The `Get()` method is like "Give me the NTuple or immediately throw, I don't care about any errors (or I know there really is an NTuple there)"
The `RResult<T>` type cannot automatically decay into `T`. We wanted to make this an explicit call because it involves verifying that we really have a valid object and not an exception in our hands.
